response.overview: Chasing the White Air- This feel-good documentary takes the viewer on a visit to the world of competitive skiing and snowboard jumping and captures the emotion and adrenaline which these athletes seek. Set on the beautiful snow-covered Australian mountain, Mt Kosciusko, see international competitors sail off 92 foot jumps, traveling over 100 miles per hour, to display their amazing aerobatics.
response.title: Chasing the White Air
